entries.label: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
The Dadra And Nagar Haveli And Daman And Diu
Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
Ministry Of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises
Ministry of Fisheries,Animal Husbandry and Dairying
Ministry Of New and Renewable Energy
Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
Ministry of Women and Child Development
Ministry Of Skill Development And Entrepreneurship
Ministry Of Personnel, Public Grievances And Pensions
Ministry Of Petroleum and Natural Gas
Comptroller And Auditor General Of India
Ministry Of Environment,forests and climate change
Ministry Of Consumer Affairs, Food And Public Distribution
Ministry Of Development Of North Eastern Region
Ministry Of Statistics and Programme Implementation
NITI Aayog (National Institution for Transforming India)

fields.schemeName: Dr.Babasaheb Ambedkar Udyog Uday Yojana: Assistance for Interest Subsidy (Manufacturing Sector)
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Dr.Babasaheb Ambedkar Udyog Uday Yojana" aims to support SC/ST entrepreneurs and strengthen MSMEs, making them globally competitive.

fields.schemeName: Haryana State Merit Scholarship Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to support meritorious students from economically backward sections in pursuing higher education. Under this scheme, financial assistance is provided to students pursuing Degree, Post-Graduate, and Doctorate courses.

fields.schemeName: Incentives to Women Entrepreneurs Scheme, 2008
fields.briefDescription: "Incentives to Women Entrepreneurs Scheme, 2008" aimed to encourage women entrepreneurship and promote self-employment by providing additional incentives such as interest subsidies and preferential treatment under capital contribution schemes. The scheme benefited women-owned industrial units.

fields.schemeName: Grant-in-Aid Scheme to Provide Financial Assistance to the Mahila Mandals
fields.briefDescription: "Grant-in-Aid Scheme to Provide Financial Assistance to the Mahila Mandals" aims to provide financial assistance to Mahila Mandals for training and self-employment activities. The scheme benefits registered Mahila Mandals in Goa, encouraging women's socio-economic development.

fields.schemeName: Transport Loan Scheme
fields.briefDescription: "Transport Loan Scheme" aims to promote self-employment among target groups by providing term loans for Light Motor Vehicles. The scheme benefits Scheduled Castes, Other Backward Classes, Minorities, and Safai Karamcharis with financial assistance up to ₹5,00,000/-.

fields.schemeName: Scheme for Assistance to Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSME): Assistance for Interest Subsidy (Service Sector)
fields.briefDescription: The "Scheme for Assistance to Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSME)" launched by the Industries and Mines Department aims to position Gujarat as a global business hub, promoting sustainable manufacturing, MSME growth, and export competitiveness.

fields.schemeName: Death Assistance Scheme (BBOCWWB)
fields.briefDescription: The "Death Assistance" scheme provides financial assistance to the legal heir in the case of natural death or accidental death of the registered worker. If the death occurs during a disaster and a grant has already been given by Disaster Management, only ₹1,00,000/- will be payable by the Board.

fields.schemeName: Financial Assistance for Cremation (BBOCWWB)
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Financial Assistance for Cremation" by the Bihar Building & Other Construction Workers Welfare Board, Labour Resources Department, Government of Bihar, provides financial assistance of ₹5,000/-to the dependents of the deceased worker for performing cremation.

fields.schemeName: Dr.Babasaheb Ambedkar Udyog Uday Yojana: Assistance to basic industrial infrastructure (Water, Gas and Approach Road)
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Dr.Babasaheb Ambedkar Udyog Uday Yojana" aims to support SC/ST entrepreneurs and strengthen MSMEs, making them globally competitive.

fields.schemeName: Dr.Babasaheb Ambedkar Udyog Uday Yojana: Assistance to GIDC for Developing Multi-Storied Shed in Estates
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Dr.Babasaheb Ambedkar Udyog Uday Yojana" aims to support SC/ST entrepreneurs and strengthen MSMEs, making them globally competitive.

fields.schemeName: Divyangjan Scholarship Scheme
fields.briefDescription: "Divyangjan Scholarship Scheme" provides financial assistance for the education and training of differently-abled children, who are regular students in a school or college. The application needs to be submitted to the District Office, Panchayat and Social Welfare / Janpad Panchayat Office.

fields.schemeName: Rajiv Gandhi Scholarship Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to encourage brilliant students and inculcate a spirit of competition among them. Under this scheme, scholarships/incentives are provided to meritorious students studying in Class VI to Class XII in government schools.

fields.schemeName: Scheme for Assistance to Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSME): Assistance for Patent Registration
fields.briefDescription: The "Scheme for Assistance to Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSME)" launched by the Industries and Mines Department aims to position Gujarat as a global business hub, promoting sustainable manufacturing, MSME growth, and export competitiveness.

fields.schemeName: Gujarat Textile Policy: Assistance to SHG for Job Work (Fiscal Incentives to Labour Intensive Unit)
fields.briefDescription: The "Gujarat Textile Policy" introduced by the Industries and Mines Department aims to create a vibrant Textile Sector ecosystem and generate enormous employment opportunities in the State.

fields.schemeName: Scheme for Assistance to Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSME): Assistance for Technology Acquisition
fields.briefDescription: The "Scheme for Assistance to Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSME)" launched by the Industries and Mines Department aims to position Gujarat as a global business hub, promoting sustainable manufacturing, MSME growth, and export competitiveness.

fields.schemeName: Bunkar Parivar Sahayata Yojana
fields.briefDescription: "Bunkar Parivar Sahayata Yojana" aims to provide immediate financial assistance to families of weavers in case of sudden death. The scheme benefits the families of working weavers who are members of primary weaver cooperative societies by providing financial support of ₹20,000/-.

fields.schemeName: Educational Study Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The "Educational Study Scheme" provides financial assistance in the form of loans for self-supporting graduate-level courses in professional fields such as Medical, Dental, Engineering, Technology, Pharmacy, Architecture, Nursing, Homeopathy, Veterinary, and similar disciplines.

fields.schemeName: Coaching Help Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The "Coaching Help Scheme" provides financial support to non-reserved category students pursuing science in Standard-11 and Standard-12 by covering additional tuition costs.

fields.schemeName: Women Scientist Scheme-A
fields.briefDescription: A Research Grant by MoST for female candidates to pursue research in frontier areas of science and engineering, preferably those having a break in career (minimum two years) and not having regular employment, to explore possibility of re-entry into the profession.

fields.schemeName: RMEWF-Financial Assistance For Education Of Children & Widows Of Ex-Servicemen
fields.briefDescription: A scheme to provide financial assistance to Ex-Servicemen and their widows for helping them in educating their child (for maximum two children) up to graduation and also for widows to pursue Post Graduation degree.

fields.schemeName: Women Scientist Scheme-B
fields.briefDescription: A Research Grant by MoST for female candidates with break in their career interested in addressing societal challenges through viable S&T interventions. Women scientists who wish to apply under this scheme are required to develop their own project/proposals for scientific and technological solutions

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
fields.schemeName: IVRI Institute Scholarship For M.V.Sc. And Ph.D.
fields.briefDescription: The Indian Veterinary Research Institute will award scholarships to MVSc and PhD students who need financial assistance.his provision will be utilized to assist as many students as possible who have good academic record and who are making diligent efforts to pursue higher education.

fields.schemeName: Prime Minister's Scholarship Scheme
fields.briefDescription: Prime Minister’s Scholarship Scheme (PMSS) was introduced in the academic year 2006-07 by the Department of Ex-servicemen Welfare, to encourage higher technical and professional education for the dependent wards of Ex-Servicemen / Ex-Coast Guard personnel and their widows.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
fields.schemeName: Agricultural Extension
fields.briefDescription: Extension Division endeavours towards successful implementation of Agricultural Extension activities. Through its various programmes, schemes and activities, Extension Division helps farmers to get information regarding scientific research and new knowledge in agricultural practices.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
fields.schemeName: Sub-mission On Agriculture Mechanization
fields.briefDescription: The Sub-Mission on Agricultural Mechanization was launched in 2014-15 by the Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers’ Welfare.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
fields.schemeName: Post Matric Scholarship Students With Disabilities
fields.briefDescription: A scholarship scheme by DoEPwD for students with disabilities pursuing a post-matric qualification from UGC/AICTE recognized universities, i.e. students of Class 11th, Class 12th, including Polytechnics, Post-Matriculation Diploma/Certificates and Bachelor’s/Master’s Degree/Diploma in India.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
fields.schemeName: Financial Assistance Under The National Fund For Persons With Disabilities
fields.briefDescription: A scheme by DoEPwDs for providing financial assistance to the Persons with Disabilities (PwDs) in support of various livelihood activities. The objective of these guidelines is to provide a framework to support financial assistance under the Fund for relevant core areas  for empowerment of PwDs.

fields.schemeName: Research Fellowship In Sciences For Meritorious Students
fields.briefDescription: The Research Fellowship in Sciences for meritorious students (RFSMS) scheme of the UGC is open to candidates who have registered for Ph.D. in Science in Universities with Potential for Excellence/Centres with Potential for Excellence/Centres of Advance Studies and Department of Special Assistance.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
fields.schemeName: National Talent Scholarship Postgraduate
fields.briefDescription: Merit based support through National Talent Scholarship to the Under-graduates and Post graduate students seeking admission in Agricultural Universities in a State other than the State of their domicile, through ICAR All India Entrance Examination (AIEE).

fields.schemeName: Scheme to Provide Assistance for Construction of Retail Outlets/ Agricultural Malls in State Market Committees
fields.briefDescription: This scheme has been introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Dept., Gujarat. It aims to support market committees in constructing retail outlets and agricultural malls to facilitate direct selling of farmers' produce, ensuring better pricing and increasing farmers' income.

fields.schemeName: Interest Help Scheme For Graduate Doctor-Lawyer-Technical Graduate
fields.briefDescription: The "Interest Help Scheme for Graduate Doctor-Lawyer-Technical Graduate" aims to provide financial assistance in the form of interest subsidy on loans to the non-reserved category professionals in Gujarat.

fields.schemeName: Interest Subvention against long terms loan to the Co-operative sugar societies (Normal Area) (Tribal Area)
fields.briefDescription: This scheme has been introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, Gujarat. It aims to provide interest subvention on long-term loans taken by sugar cooperative societies for payment of sugarcane arrears for the year 2018-19.

fields.schemeName: Wire Fencing Around the Farm for Crop Protection
fields.briefDescription: This scheme has been introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Dept., Gujarat. It aims to protect farmers' crops from damage caused by wild and stray animals by providing financial assistance for wire fencing around farms.

fields.schemeName: Kanyadaan Scheme (CBOCWWB)
fields.briefDescription: Under this scheme, financial assistance will be granted to the workers who are registered under the CBOCWWB on the eve of the marriage of his/her daughter and self-marriage of female registered workers.

fields.schemeName: Motorized Tricycle Yojana
fields.briefDescription: Under this scheme, motorized tricycles are provided to specially-abled individuals with 50% or more locomotor disability to support self-employment and pursuing higher education from Senior Higher Secondary onwards.

fields.schemeName: Financial Assistance to Newlyweds under Kanyadan Yojana (Vijabhaj)
fields.briefDescription: "Financial Assistance to Newlyweds under Kanyadan Yojana (Vijabhaj)" was launched by the Dept of Social Justice & Special Assistance, Govt of Maharashtra. The scheme aims to reduce the economic, social, and educational backwardness of Scheduled Castes, Freed Castes, Nomadic Tribes, etc.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS) For Handicraft Artisans: Assistance For Capital Investment For The Handloom And Handicrafts Artisans Of The U.T. Requiring Financial Assistance For Purchase Of Machinery Or Raw Materials
fields.briefDescription: This is a sub-scheme under the “Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS)”, implemented by the Dept. of Industries, U.T. Administration Of DNH & DD, that aims to provide financial assistance for purchase of machinery or raw materials for development of their business.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS) for MSME Sector: Assistance For Capital Investment In Solar Power Generation
fields.briefDescription: “Assistance For Capital Investment In Solar Power Generation” under the “Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS)” for MSME sector, by the Dept. of Industries, DNH & DD, aims to encourage MSMEs to use Solar Power through providing Capital subsidy for setting up of Solar Power Plant for generation of power.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS) for MSME Sector: Assistance To Small And Medium Enterprises (SME) For Raising Of Capital Through SME Exchange
fields.briefDescription: “Assistance SME For Raising Of Capital Through SME Exchange” under the “Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS)” for MSME sector, implemented by the Dept. of Industries, U.T. Administration Of DNH & DD, aims to provide One-time assistance of expenditure incurred on raising of fund through SME Exchange.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS) for MSME Sector: Assistance of Interest Subsidy
fields.briefDescription: “Assistance of Interest Subsidy” under the “Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS)” for MSME sector, implemented by the Dept. of Industries, U.T. Administration Of DNH & DD, aims to provide Interest Subsidy on the term loan on equipment/machinery etc and furniture’s / fixtures (except land and building).

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS) for MSME Sector: Assistance For Participation In Industrial Exhibitions Abroad
fields.briefDescription: “Assistance For Participation In Industrial Exhibitions Abroad” under the “Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS)” for MSME sector, by the Dept. of Industries, DNH & DD, aims to promote the Products and Services of the territory abroad and their businesses to expand  the customer base all over the world.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS) for Thrust Sectors: Scheme For Food Processing Industries
fields.briefDescription: “Scheme For Food Processing Industries'' under the “Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS)” for Thrust Sectors, implemented by the Dept. of Industries, U.T. Administration Of DNH & DD, aims to provide Interest Subsidy to the Establishment /Expansion of Food processing industries.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS) for Textile Sector: Assistance Of Interest Subsidy For Textile Sector
fields.briefDescription: “Assistance Of Interest Subsidy For Textile Sector” under the “Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS)” for Textile Sector, implemented by the Dept. of Industries, U.T. Administration Of DNH & DD, aims to provide credit linked interest subsidy for Textile and Technical Textile sector.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS): Environment Protection Infrastructure Subsidy
fields.briefDescription: “Environment Protection Infrastructure Subsidy'' under the “Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS)”, implemented by the Dept. of Industries, U.T. Administration Of DNH & DD, aims to promote Installation of Environment Protection Infrastructure for a cleaner environment.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
fields.schemeName: National Awards For Empowerment Of Persons With Disabilities: National Awards For Institutions Engaged In Empowering Persons With Disabilities: Divyangjanon Ke Sashaktikaran Men Karyrat Sarveshrestha Sansthan (Private Organization, NGO)
fields.briefDescription: The "Divangjano ke Shashaktikaran Mein Karyrat Sarveshrestha Sansthan" award is given by DoEPwD to an organization working for the empowerment of Persons with Disabilities for a minimum period of 10 years after registration under Society Act/ Trust Act / Section 8 of Companies Act 2013.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Ex-gratia for Death for the Construction Workers
fields.briefDescription: The "Ex-gratia for Death for the Construction Workers'' by the BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department,  U.T. Administration of DNH & DD, is a welfare scheme that provides financial assistance for death to the nominees/ dependents of a deceased registered member.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Retirement Relief in Quitting Service for the Construction Workers
fields.briefDescription: The "Retirement Relief in Quitting Service for the Construction Workers'' by the BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department,  U.T. Administration of DNH & DD, is a welfare scheme that provides a certain amount to the eligible registered worker on quitting service after attaining age of 60 years.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Bus Passes for the Construction Workers
fields.briefDescription: The "Bus Passes for the Construction Workers'' by the BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department,  U.T. Administration of DNH & DD, is a welfare scheme that provides 50% reimbursement of the travelling cost of registered construction workers who travel by bus from various villages in search of work.

fields.schemeName: Assistance For Delivery / Miscarriage Of Pregnancy / Termination Of Pregnancy To Female Differently Abled Person
fields.briefDescription: The Government of Tamil Nadu introduced "Assistance for Delivery/Miscarriage of Pregnancy/Termination of Pregnancy to Female Differently Abled Person.

fields.schemeName: Economic Help To Tribal Girls For Higher Education (College Level)
fields.briefDescription: Rajasthan Government started a scholarship for tribal girls higher education (College Level) In the year 1994-95.

fields.schemeName: Chief Minister Ladli Behna Yojana
fields.briefDescription: In 2023, Madhya Pradesh State Government started "Chief Minister Ladli Behna Yojana" for women empowerment

fields.schemeName: Widow B.Ed Scheme-Rajasthan
fields.briefDescription: In 2015-16, Rajasthan State started the "Widow B.Ed Scheme" for Widow/abandoned women.

fields.schemeName: Kanya Sumangala Yojana
fields.briefDescription: Various schemes are run by the government for the purpose of providing social security to women, Kanya Sumangala Yojana is one such scheme.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry of Fisheries,Animal Husbandry and Dairying
fields.schemeName: National Livestock Mission: Genetic Improvement of Pig Breeds - Import of Exotic Pig Germplasm
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to enhance indigenous pig productivity through genetic upgradation. The scheme supports the establishment of pig semen collection and processing labs and the import of exotic pig germplasm.

fields.schemeName: Pre-Matric Scholarship Scheme for the Children of Parents/Guardians Engaged in Unclean and Hazardous Occupations - Goa
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to children whose parents belong to Other Disadvantaged Categories, supporting their education at pre-matric level. This initiative seeks to enhance student participation & reduce dropout rates, particularly during the transition from primary to upper

fields.schemeName: Scheme of Internship of Students to DRDO Labs/Estts for Project Training
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to provide an opportunity and exposure to future graduates and postgraduates in Engineering and General Sciences to the research and development activities carried out by DRDO in state-of-the-art technology in fields relevant to the defense sector.

fields.schemeName: Assistance to Farmers to Purchase Heavy Farm Equipment (Tractor)
fields.briefDescription: This scheme has been introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, Gujarat. It aims to provide financial assistance to farmers for purchasing tractors, promoting farm mechanization and increasing farm power availability.

fields.schemeName: Marriage Assistance to Person with Disability / BPL
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to support differently-abled brides/bridegrooms from BPL families by providing financial assistance to meet marriage-related expenses. Under this scheme, an amount of ₹30,000/- is provided to Scheduled Tribe, differently-abled brides/bridegrooms for their first marriage.

fields.schemeName: Theka Shramik, Hamaal Shramik Evan Gharelu Mahila Kamgar Gambhir Bimaari Chikitsa Sahayata Yojana
fields.briefDescription: Chhattisgarh State Government started a scheme "Theka Shramik, Hamaal Shramik Evan Gharelu Mahila Kamgar Gambhir Bimaari Chikitsa Sahayata Yojana" for unorganized worker on 05 June 2018.

fields.schemeName: Theka Shramik, Gharelu Mahila Kamgar Evan Hamaal Shramik Ke Bachcho Hetu Chhaatravrtti Yojana
fields.briefDescription: Chhattisgarh State Government started a scheme "Theka Shramik, Gharelu Mahila Kamgar Evan Hamaal Shramik Ke Bachcho Hetu Chhaatravrtti Yojana" for unorganized worker on 11 March 2015.

fields.schemeName: West Bengal Incentive Scheme for Approved Industrial Park (SAIP) for MSMEs: Incentive for Common Effluent Treatment Plant (CETP)
fields.briefDescription: The “Incentive for Common Effluent Treatment Plant (CETP)” under the “SAIP for MSMEs” scheme, aims to provide reimbursement for installation of CETP, wherever applicable, based on land area of AIP.

fields.schemeName: The West Bengal Incentive Scheme: Capacity Utilisation
fields.briefDescription: “Capacity Utilisation” incentives under the “The West Bengal Incentive Scheme” implemented by the Dept. of Tourism, Government of West Bengal, aims to provide additional Floor Area Ratio (FAR) over and above the maximum permissible FAR as may be fixed by the competent authority.

fields.schemeName: West Bengal Incentive Scheme for Approved Industrial Park (SAIP) for MSMEs: Reimbursement of Stamp Duty
fields.briefDescription: “Reimbursement of Stamp Duty” under the “SAIP for MSMEs” scheme, aims to provide reimbursement of stamp duty paid by the SPV for registration of land documents.

fields.schemeName: The West Bengal Incentive Scheme: Tourism Promotion Assistance in lieu of Interest Subsidy
fields.briefDescription: “Tourism Promotion Assistance in lieu of Interest Subsidy” incentive under the “The West Bengal Incentive Scheme” aims to provide Tourism Promotion Assistance for SGST irrespective of the location of the project, which will be in lieu of interest subsidy.

fields.schemeName: Financial assistance to Meritorious Scheduled Tribe Students who have Passed First Division from Board and University
fields.briefDescription: The objective of the scheme is to motivate meritorious Scheduled Tribe students of Rajasthan by providing one-time financial assistance of ₹3,500/- to those pursuing regular college courses and achieving first division.

fields.schemeName: Incentive for Inter-Caste Marriage Scheme
fields.briefDescription: "Incentive For Inter Caste Marriage" aims to promote inter-caste marriages between SC and non-SC communities to combat casteism. The scheme provides a financial incentive of ₹50,000/- to eligible couples, with either spouse being a permanent resident of NCT of Delhi.

fields.schemeName: Distance Education Scheme for Girls
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to support girls' higher education through distance learning by reimbursing their course fees for UG, PG, Diploma, Certificate, and PG Diploma undertaken by girls through distance education in Rajasthan.

fields.schemeName: Urdu Scholarship- Rajasthan
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to promote the Urdu language among female students at the undergraduate and postgraduate levels. Under this scheme, a monthly scholarship is provided to undergraduate and postgraduate students who are studying Urdu as an optional subject.

fields.schemeName: Assistance for Daughter's Marriage
fields.briefDescription: Under this scheme, financial assistance of ₹25,000/- per girl is provided for a maximum of two marriageable daughters of widows of ex-servicemen up to the rank of Havaldar, who are not receiving a Marriage Grant from the Kendriya Sainik Board.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
fields.schemeName: Digital India Internship Scheme
fields.briefDescription: An opportunity for a student to secure practical work experience under the guidance of a qualified and experienced Supervisor/Mentor in Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY) in the form of Digital India Internship Scheme.

fields.schemeName: Rajya Pratibha Khoj Pariksha Chhatravriti Yojana
fields.briefDescription: Under this scheme, students are provided with scholarships or a one-time incentive for pursuing education up to the postgraduate level, after being selected through the State Talent Search Examination organized by the Board of Secondary Education Rajasthan, Ajmer.

fields.schemeName: Subsidy to Purchase E-Bike for Journalists
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to journalists in Goa for purchasing e-bikes at a subsidised rate. The benefits include making it more convenient for journalists to gather and disseminate news, with the intended beneficiaries being eligible Goa-based journalists.

fields.schemeName: Goa State Working Journalists Welfare Scheme
fields.briefDescription: "Goa State Working Journalists Welfare Scheme" aims to improve the welfare of working journalists retired from service in Goa and their families. It provides a monthly welfare fund of ₹ 7,500/- and family pension benefits for eligible journalists and their dependents.

fields.schemeName: Technology Acquisition Assistance
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to support Micro and Small enterprises in state to acquire advanced technology/ software related to their production/ manufacturing processes through assistance towards cost incurred for technology/ software acquisition.

fields.schemeName: Eklavya Prashikshan Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The "Eklavya Prashikshan Yojana" by the Directorate of Higher Education, Government of Jharkhand, aims to provide free coaching and financial aid for competitive exam preparation. Eligible students receive free coaching and ₹2,500/- monthly assistance during the coaching period.

fields.schemeName: Subsidy Scheme on Establishment of 25 R.I.R./Kadaknath & 1000 Broiler Bird’s Unit and Stipend for Poultry Farming Training for Scheduled Tribes People of the State
fields.briefDescription: This scheme has been introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, Gujarat. It aims to provide financial assistance and training stipends to Scheduled Tribe (ST) individuals in Gujarat for poultry farming.

fields.schemeName: Self-Employment Scheme: Transport/ Logistics/ Travels/ Food Court Wyaaj Sahaay
fields.briefDescription: "Transport/ Logistics/ Travels/ Food Court Wyaaj Sahaay" is a component under the "Self-Employment Scheme" that provides 5% interest subsidy on a bank loan of ₹6,00,000/- for purchasing vehicles and setting up the required infrastructure.

fields.schemeName: Aapki Beti Yojana
fields.briefDescription: Under the scheme, financial assistance of ₹2,100/- per year is provided to girls studying in Class 1 to 8 in government schools, belonging to families living below the poverty line (BPL) and whose both or one parent has passed away. Girls studying in Class 9 to 12 receive ₹2,500/- per year.

fields.schemeName: Scholarship for C.G. Domicile Students Pursuing Engineering Courses Outside Chhattisgarh State
fields.briefDescription: The scheme supports students in their first year and fills vacant awards in subsequent years (II/III/IV). Key benefits include financial aid to cover educational expenses and encouragement for students to pursue quality education. Eligible applicants must be Chhattisgarh domicile.

fields.schemeName: Indira Gandhi National Old Age Pension Scheme (Punjab)
fields.briefDescription: In this scheme, persons aged between 60 and 79 years receive a pension of ₹200/- per month, while those aged 80 years and above receive ₹500/- per month. The scheme applies only to persons belonging to the Below Poverty Line (BPL) category.

fields.schemeName: Scholarship for Chhattisgarh Students Studying Outside the State
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to support native Chhattisgarh students pursuing engineering degrees outside the state by providing a monthly scholarship of ₹2,000/-. This initiative benefits meritorious students enrolled in recognised engineering colleges outside Chhattisgarh.

fields.schemeName: Indira Gandhi National Disability Pension Scheme (Punjab)
fields.briefDescription: The "Indira Gandhi National Disability Pension Scheme (IGNDPS)" provides ₹300/- per month to disabled persons (80% or more disability) aged 18 and above. After age 80, the amount increases to ₹500/-. Dwarfs are also eligible.

fields.schemeName: Merit cum Means Scholarship: Polytechnic Institutions
fields.briefDescription: "Merit cum Means Scholarship: Polytechnic Institutions" is a scholarship scheme by the Technical Education Department, Government of Chhattisgarh. The scheme provides ₹600/- per month to eligible students for pursuing education from recognized Polytechnic Institutions in Chhattisgarh.

fields.schemeName: Mukhyamantri Shiksha Alankar Yojana for Students of Economically Weaker Section
fields.briefDescription: Under the scheme, a cash award of ₹50,000 will be given to students studying in government schools affiliated with the Rajasthan Board of Secondary Education, Ajmer, who secure the highest marks in the EWS category in the Class 10th and Class 12th examinations (Arts, Commerce, and Science streams).

fields.schemeName: Bicycle Distribution Scheme for Girl Students of Economically Weaker Section
fields.briefDescription: Under this scheme, free bicycles will be distributed to 5,800 girl students belonging to the Economically Weaker Section (EWS), who are studying in government schools from Class 6 to Class 8, to facilitate their commute between home and school.

fields.schemeName: Free Scooty Distribution for Girls (GEN-CATEGAORY-EWS)
fields.briefDescription: Under this scheme, meritorious girl students from government and private schools who have scored 85% or above in the Class 10th and 12th (Arts, Commerce, Science streams) examinations are provided with a free scooty, along with a helmet and petrol.

fields.schemeName: To Provide Interest Subvention to Animal Husbandry of the State at the Rate of 4% to the Beneficiaries Kisan Credit Card
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to provide 4% interest subvention to cattle breeders in Gujarat on timely repayment of short-term loans taken through the Kisan Credit Card for animal husbandry activities.

fields.schemeName: One Act Play competition at High School, Higher Secondary School and College level (Konkani, Marathi & English)
fields.briefDescription: The "One Act Play Competition" is a Cultural Scheme by the Department of Art, Culture and Museums, Government of Goa, encouraging students' personality development through theatre, with participation open to all Goan schools and colleges, and transport assistance provided as per government norms.

fields.schemeName: Bhajan Pakhawaj Workshops
fields.briefDescription: The objective of the scheme is to provide knowledge of appropriate and traditional Bhajan Singing and Pakhawaj playing to Bhajan performers through experts from the respective field. Applications are invited by announcement in local print & electronic media. Certificates are awarded to participants.

fields.schemeName: Scheme for Rearing Purebreed Gir/ Kankarage Male Cow Calves with Excellent Genetic Quality
fields.briefDescription: The scheme provides financial assistance to registered Gaushalas for rearing purebred Gir or Kankrej male cow calves with high genetic quality to promote pure breeding in indigenous cattle.

fields.schemeName: All Goa Classical Dance Competition
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "All Goa Classical Dance Competition" is open for Bharatnatyam and Kathak disciplines. Only solo dance will be considered for the competition. Costumes and accompanists are to be arranged by the participants at their own cost. Open to local students between 12 to 20 years of age.

fields.schemeName: Samajik Sewa Bhatta Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to support traditional faith healers by providing a monthly pension. Under this scheme, ₹1,500 is provided to each eligible traditional healer across the state.

fields.schemeName: Assistance of Concentrate Feed for Pregnant Animals (General Category)
fields.briefDescription: This scheme provides free BIS type II concentrate feed to pregnant cattle owned by General Category livestock owners in Gujarat to ensure their good health, boost immunity, prevent metabolic diseases, and enhance milk production.

fields.schemeName: Scheme for Awarding Fellowships for Undergraduate and Postgraduate Students
fields.briefDescription: The "Scheme for Awarding Fellowships for Undergraduate and Postgraduate Students" provides financial support in the form of monthly scholarships to students pursuing higher education in various faculties at Anand Agricultural University.

fields.schemeName: The Scheme for Fellowship to Under Graduate Students for Various Faculties of Sardarkrushinagar Dantiwada Agricultural University
fields.briefDescription: "The Scheme for Fellowship to Under Graduate Students for Various Faculties of Sardarkrushinagar Dantiwada Agricultural University" provides monthly fellowship to meritorious undergraduate students across various faculties of Sardarkrushinagar Dantiwada Agricultural University.

fields.schemeName: Trainning Scheme for Horticulture Skill Development to Landless farm labour at Centre of Excelence of Department
fields.briefDescription: The "Training Scheme for Horticulture Skill Development to Landless Farm Labour at Centre of Excellence of Department" aims to provide skill development training in horticulture to landless farm labourers through the Centres of Excellence.

fields.schemeName: Scheme of Production of Domestic Indigenous Certified Seed of Cotton Varieties
fields.briefDescription: The "Scheme of Production of Domestic Indigenous Certified Seed of Cotton Varieties"  introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, aims to promote the cultivation and production of local cotton seed varieties across Gujarat.

fields.schemeName: Construction of Dudhghar/ Godown (Scheduled Tribe Area)
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Construction of Dudhghar/ Godown (Scheduled Tribe Area)" provides financial assistance for the construction of Dudhghar (milk storage unit) and Godown (cattle feed storage) for Village Milk Producer Co-operative Societies in Scheduled Tribe areas of Gujarat.

fields.schemeName: Scheme to Assist for Infrastructural Facilities for Gaushalas & Panjrapole
fields.briefDescription: "Scheme to Assist for Infrastructural Facilities for Gaushalas & Panjrapole" aims to support animal welfare organizations like gaushalas and panjrapoles by offering financial assistance for the development and construction of essential infrastructure.

fields.schemeName: Mukhyamantri Pichhda Varg Evam Ati Pichhda Varg Kaushal Vikas Prashikshan Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to improve employability through free skill training for youth of backward and extremely backward communities.
